dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Dan McGrorty
Sent: Sunday, September 12, 2004 2:36 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; abuse@haleyhosting.com; jason@haleyhosting.com;
vjw757@aol.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement
Importance: High

 

Daniel McGrorty
PO Box 675
Drain, OR 97435-0675

 


HaleyHosting123.com
3009 Avenue J
Brooklyn, NY 11210

 

 

The Planet Internet Services
1333 N Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

 

 

September 12, 2004

 

 

Re: Electronic Notice of Copyright Infringement

 


This letter is to inform you of a copyright and intellectual property rights
infringement on your server(s). I own the copyright in the web design, text
and images of the web site at  <http://www.williamswebfamily.com>
www.williamswebfamily.com and all pages to which it links. My entire web
site  <http://www.mcgrorty.com> www.mcgrorty.com has been copied, altered
and downloaded to your server at  <http://www.williamswebfamily.com>
www.williamswebfamily.com.

 

Please immediately remove the web site at
<http://www.williamswebfamily.com> www.williamswebfamily.com and provide a
written or electronic confirmation of its removal.

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title
17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and
that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.

 

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), this letter serves
as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.

 

As you may know, if this information is not removed after notice that
complies with the DMCA, the Internet Service Provider may also be held
liable for the copyright infringement.

 

If you would like to discuss this matter, please do not hesitate to contact
me.

 

 

Daniel McGrorty

 


*************************************  Infringing Site Information
*********************************************************************
